title: So happy together
author: VD
content_html:
At long last, my Treo has been returned to me… actually, they gave me a new one but she looks exactly the same, so there you go. After such a long and arduous absence, we’d like to be alone for a while, if you don’t mind.

Unfortunately, it turns out that Bliss Palm does not work on the 600. So much for the dream of carrying an Intellivision in your pocket to go with the porta-library. Looks like I’ll have to wait until I move up to the 700p this autumn. Does anyone happen to know what the Bible says about polytechny?
content_text:
At long last, my Treo has been returned to me… actually, they gave me a new one but she looks exactly the same, so there you go.  After such a long and arduous absence, we’d like to be alone for a while, if you don’t mind.
Unfortunately, it turns out that Bliss Palm does not work on the 600.  So much for the dream of carrying an Intellivision in your pocket to go with the porta-library.  Looks like I’ll have to wait until I move up to the 700p this autumn.  Does anyone happen to know what the Bible says about polytechny?
